classData.comment:
/**
 * Default configuration object for the MCP Client.
 * Defines available MCP servers and their connection details.
 */
classData.description: Default configuration object for the MCP Client. Defines available MCP servers and their connection details.
classData.name: defaultConfig

classData.comment:
/**
     * A map of MCP server configurations.
     * The key is the logical name of the server (e.g., 'github-workflow').
     * The value is an object with 'command' and 'args' properties.
     */
classData.description: A map of MCP server configurations. The key is the logical name of the server (e.g., 'github-workflow'). The value is an object with 'command' and 'args' properties.
classData.name: mcpServers

classData.comment:
/**
 * @summary Configuration manager for the MCP Client.
 *
 * Supports loading configuration from a custom file and merging with defaults.
 * This class provides a centralized place to define and manage MCP server connection details.
 *
 * @class Neo.ai.mcp.client.Config
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 * @singleton
 */
classData.summary:
Configuration manager for the MCP Client.

Supports loading configuration from a custom file and merging with defaults.
This class provides a centralized place to define and manage MCP server connection details.
classData.name: Config

classData.comment:
/**
     * The current configuration object.
     * Starts with defaults and can be updated via load().
     * @member {Object} data
     */
classData.description: The current configuration object. Starts with defaults and can be updated via load().
classData.name: data

classData.comment:
/**
     * Initializes the configuration object by deep cloning the defaults.
     * @param {Object} config
     */
classData.description: Initializes the configuration object by deep cloning the defaults.
classData.name: construct

classData.description: Loads configuration from a JSON or MJS file and merges it with defaults.
classData.name: load
